title: May 31, 2024 — Structured data types — General Availability | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
A structured type is an ARRAY, OBJECT, or MAP that contains elements or key-value pairs with specific
Snowflake data types. Structured types are now generally available.

Currently, tables other than Apache Iceberg™ tables do not support structured types.
You cannot add a column of a structured type to a regular table.
For more information, see Structured data types.
